mapper.select:
select id as id, hotelId as hotelId, roomId as roomId, recordDate as recordDate, store as store, creationDate as creationDate, createdBy as createdBy, modifyDate as modifyDate, modifiedBy as modifiedBy from itrip_hotel_temp_store
and id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into itrip_hotel_temp_store( hotelId as hotelId, roomId as roomId, recordDate as recordDate, store as store, creationDate as creationDate, createdBy as createdBy, modifyDate as modifyDate, modifiedBy as modifiedBy ) values(
#{hotelId as hotelId}, #{roomId as roomId}, #{recordDate as recordDate}, #{store as store}, #{creationDate as creationDate}, #{createdBy as createdBy}, #{modifyDate as modifyDate}, #{modifiedBy as modifiedBy}
